epic.title: Attendance Management
epic.body: Provides fast, reliable, and auditable attendance tracking for students and staff with transparency for parents and scalability for large institutions.

features.title: Student Attendance Management
features.body: Capture and manage student attendance with minimal effort and high accuracy.

stories.title: Daily student attendance
stories.body: Allow teachers to mark daily attendance for students.
acceptanceCriteria: Attendance defaults to Present for all students
Teachers can mark students Absent or Leave
Attendance is recorded per class and date
Duplicate attendance entries are prevented

stories.title: Period-wise student attendance
stories.body: Allow marking attendance for each academic period.
acceptanceCriteria: Attendance can be marked per subject and period
Teachers see only their assigned classes
Period attendance aggregates into daily summary
Edits are audit logged

stories.title: Bulk attendance entry
stories.body: Support bulk attendance entry and correction.
acceptanceCriteria: Bulk attendance upload supported via CSV
Validation errors reported per row
Bulk edits maintain audit trail

features.title: Staff Attendance Management
features.body: Track attendance for teachers and staff with optional IN/OUT times.

stories.title: Daily staff attendance
stories.body: Allow marking daily attendance for staff members.
acceptanceCriteria: Staff attendance can be marked Present or Absent
Attendance is recorded per date
Only authorized admins can edit staff attendance

stories.title: Staff IN/OUT time tracking
stories.body: Capture optional IN and OUT times for staff attendance.
acceptanceCriteria: IN and OUT times are optional
Multiple punches per day are supported
Attendance duration is calculated automatically

features.title: Attendance Reports & Visibility
features.body: Provide clear attendance visibility for admins, teachers, parents, and students.

stories.title: Attendance reports
stories.body: Generate attendance reports across different dimensions.
acceptanceCriteria: Daily and monthly attendance reports available
Reports filterable by class, student, staff, and date range
Reports accessible based on user role

stories.title: Parent and student attendance visibility
stories.body: Allow parents and students to view attendance records.
acceptanceCriteria: Parents can view attendance of linked students
Students can view their own attendance
Attendance percentage is clearly displayed

features.title: Leave Management
features.body: Manage student and staff leave requests with approval workflows.

stories.title: Leave request submission
stories.body: Allow students and staff to submit leave requests.
acceptanceCriteria: Leave requests can be submitted with reason and date range
Requests are linked to attendance records
Duplicate leave requests are prevented

stories.title: Leave approval workflow
stories.body: Allow admins and teachers to approve or reject leave requests.
acceptanceCriteria: Approvers can approve or reject leave
Approved leave updates attendance automatically
Approval actions are audit logged

features.title: Attendance Non-Functional Requirements
features.body: Ensure performance, reliability, and auditability of attendance operations.

stories.title: Attendance system NFRs
stories.body: Define non-functional requirements for attendance management.
acceptanceCriteria: Handle up to 5,000 attendance records per day per class
Offline attendance capture with sync support
Full audit trail for attendance edits
Sub-300ms response time for attendance APIs
